item.title: Investors Are Betting on a Market Melt-Up
item.description: They have flocked to stock funds at a pace rarely seen since 2008, but some are warning that shares look expensive historically.

item.title: For Retirees in Their 60s, the Move That Adds Years to a Nest Egg
item.description: Roth conversions allow retirees to pay taxes on their savings now, so that the money can grow tax-free in the future.

item.title: TikTok Parent ByteDance's Valuation Rises to About $300 Billion
item.description: Investors see Trump victory as a positive with the threat of TikTok ban looming in U.S.

item.title: Trump Crypto Craze Sent Bitcoin Miners Surging, but Watch Out
item.description: Investors have long used shares in bitcoin miners to gain exposure to the digital currency, but there are better options available now.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Falls 0.3% To 100.84
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was down 0.3% to 100.84 â€” snapping a five-trading-day winning streak.
